data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima.
In the minute 2, Kashima takes a corner from the left.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
In the minute 5, Gamba awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
In the minute 5, Ryuji Sato awards Kashima a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Kashima a corner.
Kashima drives forward and Kento Misao gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 7, Shoma Doi of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kashima.
Throw-in Kashima.
Kashima pushes forward through Juan Alano, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 10, Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashima's half.
Goal kick for Kashima at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba's Takashi Usami is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Gamba.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
In the minute 16, Ball safe as Gamba is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
Kashima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
In the minute 17, Everaldo (Kashima) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Gamba defenders.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Can Gamba get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kashima's half?
In the minute 20, Kashima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba are pushing forward but Kosuke Onose's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
In the minute 23, Gamba drive upfield and Kosuke Onose gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Corner awarded to Gamba.
Yosuke Ideguchi (Gamba) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 24, Can Gamba capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kashima's half?
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
Kashima's Juan Alano misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
In the minute 28, Free kick Kashima.
Everaldo (Kashima) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Free kick for Kashima in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 31, Kashima push upfield and Ryuji Izumi gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Gamba defence.
Ryuji Izumi of Kashima smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kashima.
In the minute 35, Ryuji Sato awards Kashima a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashima's half.
Juan Alano (Kashima) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 37, Kashima takes a corner from the left.
Ikuma Sekigawa (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 39, Kashima are coming forward and Everaldo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 41, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Kashima a corner.
Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 42, Throw-in high up the field for Kashima in Suita.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Goal kick for Kashima at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima.
Gamba needs to be cautious. Kashima have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
Ryuji Sato awards Kashima a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Juan Alano (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 47, Kashima are pushing forward but Leo Silva's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Suita.
Free kick Gamba.
In the minute 49, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Gamba in the half of Kashima.
Kashima's Juan Alano is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 53, Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Patric's header is off-target for Gamba.
Ball goes out of play for a Kashima goal kick.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba drive upfield and Yosuke Ideguchi gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kashima defender.
Juan Alano of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 55, Gamba have a goal kick.
Gamba's Takashi Usami misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Kashima at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
In the minute 58, Kashima are coming forward and Kento Misao gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Gamba goal kick.
Patric of Gamba smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 59, Ryuji Sato has awarded Gamba a corner.
Yosuke Ideguchi (Gamba) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 60, Ryuji Sato awards the away team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kashima's Everaldo misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 65, An attacking Gamba player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
Goal! Patric gives Gamba the lead from the penalty spot. The score is now 1-0.
Kashima takes a corner from the left.
In the minute 67, Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Gamba in their own half.
Everaldo (Kashima) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in Kashima.
In the minute 71, Gamba have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Gamba close to the penalty box.
In Suita a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 73, Kashima make their first substitution with Yasushi Endo replacing Shoma Doi.
The away team replace Ryuji Izumi with Ayase Ueda.
Ryotaro Araki is on a sub for Kento Misao for Kashima.
In the minute 74, Ryuji Sato awards the home team a throw-in.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima.
Ryuji Sato signals a throw-in for Kashima, close to Gamba's area.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Gamba.
Can Kashima get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Gamba's half?
Ryuji Sato signals a Gamba throw-in in Kashima's half.
In the minute 77, Free kick Gamba.
Ryota Nagaki is replacing Juan Alano for the away team.
Ayase Ueda (Kashima) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 78, Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Kashima a corner.
Corner awarded to Kashima.
In the minute 79, Kashima's Everaldo attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ryuji Sato awards Gamba a goal kick.
The home team replace Patric with Kazuma Watanabe.
In the minute 80, Ademilson is on a sub for Takashi Usami for Gamba.
Throw-in for Kashima at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Can Kashima capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Gamba's half?
In the minute 81, In Suita a free kick has been awarded the home team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Suita.
Yuta Matsumura is replacing Kei Koizumi for the away team.
In the minute 83, Kashima to take a throw-in in Gamba territory.
Gamba have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Kashima in their own half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Gamba in the half of Kashima.
Ball safe as Kashima is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Kashima in the half of Gamba.
In the minute 85, Everaldo (Kashima) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Kashima takes a corner from the right.
Kashima drive upfield and Yuta Matsumura gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Gamba defender.
In the minute 86, Yuta Matsumura of Kashima gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ryuji Sato awards Gamba a goal kick.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 87, Gamba awarded a free kick in their own half.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ryuji Sato signals a free kick to Kashima in their own half.
Throw-in for Gamba at Panasonic Stadium Suita.
Gamba make their third substitution with Yuya Fukuda replacing Shu Kurata.
In the minute 88, The home team replace Kosuke Onose with Shinya Yajima.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Kashima.
Ryuji Sato signals a Kashima throw-in in Gamba's half.
Free kick for Gamba in their own half.
Ryuji Sato has awarded Gamba a corner.
Kashima needs to be cautious. Gamba have an attacking throw-in.
Kashima awarded a free kick in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 4 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Kashima in their own half.
Kashima awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Everaldo for Kashima gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Gamba have a goal kick.
The match has come to a close in Suita. The final score is 2-0.
Goal! Kazuma Watanabe extends Gamba's lead to 2-0.
That's a fine assist from Ademilson.
